name: soubise
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a thick, smooth sauce made of cooked onions, mixed with béchamel (= a sauce made with butter, flour, and milk) or cream: We had the sausages with an apple and onion soubise. Cover the cooked chicken breasts with the soubise sauce.
More examplesFewer examplesThe stew came with three accompanying sauces: caper, gravy, and soubise.There was a roast rump of lamb, served with sauce soubise, asparagus, pancetta, and button onions.
